hiveArticle.title: Panoramic View of Fastrack Store
hiveArticle.body:
I went shopping today for a watch, and I was determined to get a fastrack watch and I got one.

>Fastrack was launched in 1998 and became an independent urban youth brand in 2005. Since then, it has carved a niche for itself with watches and sunglasses that are both fashionable and affordable.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYmaqs3svWkxvqLbGKB9NB1L6fmzB376w9hLz18EgdeQj/image.png)

I happened to click some of the pictures of the store too :)

Exterior of Fastrack Store
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSSBcwepmDE4R9ALgQ638p5oLxK94vMVDmSZZ58YhrKrb/image.png)

<hr>

A Panaromic View
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb2ekxa5rjW7Mgz1asGyEbFkQAkZmaoJ4yCcQTPU7xanE/image.png)
